items.translated_title: How would the Netflix-Warner Bros. deal reshape Hollywood?
items.content: It’s only been a day since Netflix announced an $82.7 billion deal to acquire Warner Bros., and the acquisition has already been described as sending Hollywood into “full-blown panic mode,” “possibly a death blow to theatrical filmmaking,” and maybe even “the end of Hollywood” itself.

items.title: This startup built a Fitbit for your brain to combat chronic stress
items.creator: Marina Temkin
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: This startup built a Fitbit for your brain to combat chronic stress
items.content: Forenza collaborated with data scientists and biomedical engineers to develop Awear, a small device worn behind the ear for continuous brainwave monitoring. The device transmits results to an app, which provides information about the wearer’s mood and offers AI-powered coaching advice for managing stress and improving emotional resilience.

items.title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
items.creator: Ivan Mehta
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
items.content: As a technology, eSIM has been around for a decade now. However, global eSIM adoption was around 3% last year and will only cross 5% this year. Despite these figures, analysts, eSIM-providing startups, and investors are bullish about eSIM's upward trajectory, largely thanks to travel.
